text:
Conrad Koh Samui offers weekend escape
Conrad Koh Samui is offering a complimentary one-night stay for guests who book a four-night weekend stay with the resort’s best available rates, under the newly introduced ‘Thailand Weekend Escape’ package. Guests can choose to spend the fourth night at Conrad Koh Samui or Conrad Bangkok.
During the weekends, Conrad Koh Samui is offering a range of beachfront activities, including Thai boxing boot camp, beach volleyball, local festive games and entertainments, as well as fire dance show and fireworks. Daily boat excursions to nearby islands for snorkelling and beach picnic are also available. For younger guests, kids amenities are offered and there will be fun activities for children to participate in.
The best available rates at Conrad Koh Samui start from 24,000 Baht per night for an Ocean-view One-Bedroom Pool Villa. To take up the Thailand Weekend Escape offer at Conrad Koh Samui, a four-night stay must be booked at least three days in advance of arrival between now and 30 November for a stay before 22 December, 2015.
Source:- Tourism Authority of Thailand
